attributes.action: Get rid of bright led headlights
attributes.additional_details: Because there a accident waiting to happen, they are so bright and dangerous at night time  , someone will eventually crash or even worse die due to these lights ,
attributes.background: Get rid of change these new car led super bright headlights, they are super bright at night time they are just as bad or even worse then full beam lights

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petitions, which call for similar action:

Ban LED headlights
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/701233

Regulate the brightness and type of vehicle headlights allowed
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711112
